text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Congratulations! A splendid victory. … I'm very impressed.
choice_data_list: It's because of her hard work.

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: As I thought, you're the only ones who can make this issue's big cover feature!
… A feature in Twinkle Monthly. We can expect a big response!
